enum: The total amount of electronic WEEE collected concerns only equipment such as computers, telephones (fixed and portable), modem printers, routers, inverters. Household WEEE such as televisions, irons, refrigerators, microwaves, etc ... are not part of it.
The total WEEE covers only computers and laptops.
The quantities of waste collected by municipal services cover only a few years and are available only for the urban community of Dakar.

At the national level, data on generation are estimated data. Thus, for a given year, the national generation of waste is estimated on the basis of 0.5kg per capita per day (figure provided by a study conducted by the Ministry of Environment) and the population provided by the National  Statistics and Demography Agency.

The total WEEE covers only computers and laptops.
The quantities of waste collected by municipal services cover only a few years and are available only for the urban community of Dakar.

At the national level, data on generation are estimated data. Thus, for a given year, the national generation of waste is estimated on the basis of 0.5kg per capita per day (figure provided by a study conducted by the Ministry of Environment) and the population provided by the National  Statistics and Demography Agency.

title: (a) Hazardous waste generated per capita; and (b) proportion of hazardous waste treated, by type of treatment
